summary:
Manchester United, also known as Man Utd, is an English soccer team based in Old Trafford. They are one of the most successful and popular clubs in the world. Founded in 1878, they won many titles, including 20 top-flight league championships and 3 European Cups/UEFA Champions Leagues.

The team has had legendary players and managers like Matt Busby, George Best, and Alex Ferguson, who led the club to numerous trophies. Manchester United is known for its passionate fans and rivalries with other English clubs. They are also one of the richest soccer clubs globally.
title: Manchester United F.C.
